name: 虫姫さまふたり
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English.  On a time axis different from the present. A vertically-scrolling bullet hell shooter unfolds against the backdrop of the travel story of Reko, a girl who has become a goddess, and the dragon-riding boy Palm.  There are 3 game modes and 2 types of machines available. It is possible to choose a combination that suits you. Moreover, the Arrange Version also strives to “achieve new gaming characteristics" and also "give new players an enjoyable gaming experience". “This journey will connect the memories of the two adventurers."
